backend/main.mo: Defines core actor state, user roles, approval flow, data models, storage maps, and authorization helpers for notices, homework, routines, and class time.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs for build planning.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend source files as reference metadata.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH theme variables, dark mode variants, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, route guards, query client, global providers, and layout structure with authentication gating.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Provides global auth context, session load/save, admin cache invalidation, role helpers, and logout handling.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Implements session storage utilities for saving, loading, and clearing role and username data in localStorage.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with navigation, header, footer, logout handling, and embeds music and assistant widgets.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Provides role-specific guidance content, intents, and responses for the assistant.
Generates assistant responses using keyword matching, context data, and role permissions.
Handles saving and loading assistant open state and chat history from localStorage.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Implements the floating assistant chat widget with message history, suggestions, actions, and role-aware responses.
frontend/src/components/assistant/sugges: Implements suggestion generation using token overlap and typo tolerance to propose related intents.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useAss: Aggregates announcements, homework, routines, and class times into summarized strings with loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthFormFie: Reusable form field with label, input, optional icons, and error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPrimary: Primary gradient button component with variants and loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthScreenL: Layout wrapper for auth pages with decorative background and centered content.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Displays a lock/unlock icon with tooltip, indicating whether a section is locked.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary component that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Fallback UI for runtime errors with an option to reload or reset the boundary.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout actions, and identity initialization via context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: React Query hooks for reading and modifying master, section, and item locks through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for applications, students, login, announcements, homework, routines, and class times with mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables for light/dark modes, and custom animations and effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with react-query and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/music/audioSources.ts: Exports the static path to the background music file.
frontend/src/music/BackgroundMusicPlayer: UI controls for playing, pausing, and muting background music with error toasts.
frontend/src/music/BackgroundMusicProvid: Manages audio element, playback state, mute state, errors, and persistence of music preferences.
frontend/src/music/musicPreferences.ts: Handles loading and saving music preference state to localStorage.
frontend/src/music/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Custom hook exposing the background music context.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard displaying applications, students, content items, and lock controls with various mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Admin password login form with UI components, validation, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest class routine with lock status and a table for each day's schedule.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Displays and manages class time entries with add, edit, delete, and locking, grouping times by weekday.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows a dashboard with announcements, routines, role-based info, and admin-only sections including pending applications.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Provides CRUD management for homework items with locking and sortable homework cards.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Handles creation, editing, deletion, and display of announcements with item-level locking.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Displays a waiting-for-approval screen with a logout option for users pending admin approval.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Presents a role selection screen directing users to student, visitor, or admin entry points.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Implements the student application form, handles submission via mutation, shows success state, and redirects to login after applying.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Provides the student login UI, performs login via API, handles approved/pending/rejected states, and navigates accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Renders a simple visitor login page that checks a static password and logs the user in as a visitor.
frontend/src/utils/adminErrors.ts: Utility for extracting error messages, categorizing admin-related errors, and generating user‑friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters, including hash‑based routing support and session persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, containers, shadows, and plugins used across the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project version, architectural notes, known issues, and existing features for a role‑based school section website with SPA behavior and admin/student workflows. Captures current problems such as blank page rendering, broken authentication flows, admin dashboard errors, and malfunctioning lock controls.
